snippet.title: Twisted Metal - 1995 PlayStation Trailer
snippet.description:
For more information on Twisted Metal please visit https://vglegacy.com/games/twisted-metal/

VG Legacy
The videos on this channel are used to supply content to VG Legacy (https://vglegacy.com), a dedicated video game website working towards building a central repository of video game content.

The goal is to provide a central repository where people can visit and learn about games, the companies involved in the video game industry and the creative talent behind the scenes.  The site is working towards piecing together the history of video games in a unique manner in which other sites have not done.
